author: Michael Larabel
description: For the Steam Survey results published last month for July it showed Steam on Linux use approaching 3%. With hitting 2.89% in July there was hope that perhaps in August it would breach the elusive 3.0% threshold not seen since the original days of Steam on Linux when the overall Steam user base was also much smaller than it is today. But that didn't pan out and Steam on Linux numbers for August are showing a small dip...
title: Steam On Linux Use Recedes Slightly During August

author: Michael Larabel
description: GIMP 3.1.4 is out today as the second development release treking toward GIMP 3.2. Most notable with GIMP 3.1.4 are the initial implementations of two of the main features planned for GIMP 3.2: link layers and vector layers...
title: GIMP 3.1.4 Released With A Project From 2006 Resurrected And Another Big Feature

author: Michael Larabel
description: With the Rust 1.90 release due out in mid-September, the Rust compiler on Linux x86_64 will begun using the LLD linker by default in order to "significantly reduce" linking times...
title: Rust 1.90 Switching To LLD Linker On Linux For Faster Linking Times

author: Michael Larabel
description: On Friday AMD sent out their initial batch of kernel graphics driver feature changes intended for merging to the Linux 6.18 kernel later this year...
title: AMD Begins Queuing Graphics Driver Changes For Linux 6.18

author: Michael Larabel
description: Not your typical review on Phoronix today but rather a brief look at the Gentex PLACE Any Space smoke detectors and carbon monoxide detectors. For those facing ten years on their Nest Protect smoke detectors and looking for an end-of-life replacement to these smoke detectors discontinued by Google, the Gentex PLACE smart smoke detectors are an interesting and capable alternative. Being faced by needing to find a replacement to Nest Protects myself that have now expired and finding many others in the same boat with no clear winning smart smoke detector right now, I decided to go with the Gentex PLACE and figured it worthwhile to share a bit of my experience.
title: Gentex PLACE Any Space PL1AS / PL1K As A Replacement For Nest Protect Smoke Detectors

author: Michael Larabel
description: The open-source Redox OS operating system project written in the Rust programming language is out with its status update covering August 2025...
title: Redox OS Gets COSMIC Reader Working, Other Improvements To This Rust OS

author: Michael Larabel
description: For those using the upstream open-source NVIDIA Linux driver "Nouveau", with a pending fix coming for Linux 6.17 and existing kernel releases it should be a much more stable and reliable experience...
title: Open-Source NVIDIA Linux Driver Usage About To Become Much More Reliable

author: Michael Larabel
description: For those looking at assembling an AMD Ryzen Threadripper PRO workstation and interested in having working system sensor monitoring support, the ASUS EC Sensors hardware monitoring (HWMON) driver is in the process of introducing support for the Pro WS WRX90E-SAGE SE motherboard...
title: Linux Sensor Monitoring Coming For The ASUS Pro WS WRX90E-SAGE SE
